languages.text: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Power Picks has additional single attack which increases armor penetration by 10 for any other attacks against target for one round. Stacks.

languages.text: Esta arma tiene una acción de ataque adicional que aumenta la penetración de armadura de todos los ataques contra el mismo objetivo en +10 durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma tiene una acción de ataque adicional que aumenta la penetración de armadura de todos los ataques contra el mismo objetivo en +10 durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: この武器には追撃アクションがあり、同じターゲットに対するそれ以降の攻撃のアーマー貫通が、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+10増加します。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: この武器には追撃アクションがあり、同じターゲットに対するそれ以降の攻撃のアーマー貫通が、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+10増加します。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 这把武器拥有额外攻击动作，可以使针对同一目标的所有后续攻击获得+10%护甲穿透加值。此效果可叠加，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器拥有额外攻击动作，可以使针对同一目标的所有后续攻击获得+10%护甲穿透加值。此效果可叠加，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat eine zusätzliche Angriffsaktion, die die Rüstungsdurchdringung aller Folgeangriffe auf dasselbe Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +10 erhöht. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat eine zusätzliche Angriffsaktion, die die Rüstungsdurchdringung aller Folgeangriffe auf dasselbe Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +10 erhöht. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Cette arme bénéficie d'une action d'attaque supplémentaire qui augmente la pénétration d'armure des attaques consécutives infligées à une même cible de +10 pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: Это оружие позволяет совершать дополнительное атакующее действие, которое на 10 увеличивает пробитие брони для всех последующих атак по этой цели в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Bu silahın, aynı hedefe yapılan sonraki tüm saldırıların zırh delme değerini 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +10 artıran ek bir saldırı eylemi bulunur. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
